item.category: The High Altitude Receiving Center (HARC) Circle

item.title: Oorkas on the Path to Fourth Density Earth
item.dc:creator: jeremy
item.content:encoded:
Introduction

After a long break, Richmond Meditation Circle makes contact with Oorkas to discuss humanity's connection to the planet as fourth density approaches. This involves the shared experience of Earth as a unifying center for all beings and the challenging path towards unifying with her. Oorkas encourages individuals to embrace the planet's struggles as part of their own journey, urging the development of one's intuitive faculties to cultivate a deep connection with Earth and a recognition of the interconnectedness of all life. This entails a shift in perspective, moving away from seeing the planet merely the setting for human activity and instead recognizing it as an full partner in our joint evolution.

Oorkas advises that true service to other selves and the planet involves learning to give without attachment to outcomes, suggesting meditation as the key to aligning with one's inner center and, by extension, the planetary center. They stress the direct and maturing experience of social memory and the importance of integrating the shadow self to foster unity and healing. The session concludes with Oorkas addressing concerns about the planet's response to global negative energies as well as relating to other selves regardless of personal affection.

Group question

How may we best synchronize with and serve the planet at this moment in its evolution?

Channeled message

(Jeremy channeling)

I am Oorkas. I am with this instrument once more. Greetings, my brothers and sisters. It has not been a long while,1 and yet we feel that you have prepared yourselves, all of you, for a new era of contact with a fourth density complex that is eager to share its harvest of experience just beyond the threshold that you stand before. We are so pleased to serve in this manner and consider you all very, very close to our vibration, for you have arrayed yourselves in this circle in a manner that reflects our positionality, our character of participation with each other, and we are all parts of a bigger complex, the biggest being that of our Infinite Radiant One, the creator of us all.

We would like to stay focused this afternoon on the topic you have chosen, and we do admit that we have exercised a say in your query, for this is a new kind of relationship between your kind on Earth and our kind of a distant planet that we call Oorkas. It is one where, together, we can begin to narrow down upon those features of harvest and the incidents that lead up to harvest—and perhaps those that directly follow if that is relevant in the moment we are speaking.

This means that we are going a bit farther than most of our brother and sister complexes of this confederation. We have been tasked with this, you see. We are bridging between the sanctity you have achieved here and the sanctity of the deep space the rest of us occupy. As such, let us caution you to exercise extreme caution in your intention setting and your reception of our message. We wish to acknowledge that this will, while not constituting transient information necessarily, provide details it is necessary for you to vet.

We ask this instrument to slow down and take a moment to recenter. We are those of Oorkas.

(Brief pause)

This instrument has calmed down a bit, for he recognizes a difference in this contact and knows that the topic is mutually arrived at, and therefore it colors a bit outside the lines of the coloring book he is used to working with. We ask him to simply pause if a concern arises. We ask you all, his friends, to keep your calm and steady. And this will help smooth over any rough spots in this contact, for he is not as practiced of late as he would like.

So we ask you to carefully consider what we say and to chuck it if it does not align with what you are seeking. Now, this does require each of you to have a clearer concept of the object of your search than many on your planet notice and acknowledge in themselves. You each here do work to achieve this, and we wish to augment that work, congratulate you for the foundational process you have initiated, and to therefore appeal to you for your profound and careful discernment.

My brothers and sisters, it is discernment that provides the epistemic basis for this message. For we cannot guarantee that the transmission will always be tight and confined to that which our mutual seeking attracts. If you would help us bring the information to your planet, then we can speak freely, not troubling ourselves with doubts about diverting you with an errant concept or an idea that, though we mean well by it, is confusing and frustrating to you. Please exercise your highest discrimination towards each and every word we speak through this instrument. Thank you. You are part of this message, and the responsibility you take for your part is a small step towards your constituency in the social memory complex.

The topic for this afternoon centers on the single object that unites all of your peoples at this moment, be they discarnate or incarnate, wanderer or native or from a planet that did not allow them to complete their third density education, shall we say. This planet is the center of all that we can say Earth is. It is the common ground (no pun intended!) of all. This does not mean that, therefore, this relating, one to another, that will blossom into social memory is well understood by you or us for that matter. Indeed, we continue to discover new vectors of energy sharing that open up our full hearts and minds to each other. For we walk forward on the evolutionary path as you do. It is the exact same direction, my friends; it is simply that we are walking down a hill that you are still ascending the crest of. And, therefore, it is our pleasure to offer some guidance and suggestions that may help you with your mission you have articulated: namely, the harmonization with the planet, with this centering that all are drawn towards, willingly or unwillingly, and the service that may be done that will cement and bless this camaraderie.

As we circle your planet—for we now, too, are in its influence—we feel the sorrow deeply. My brothers and sisters, if you wish to be in harmony with your Mother Earth, you must first acknowledge her labor pains and not simply put them out of your mind. Our complex understands why you would wish to do this, for it is overwhelming. The cries across the planet of pain, of confusion, of despair, of misunderstanding—both from those who take the active, aggressive nature of misunderstanding and those who are the recipients of its overflow into anger and violence, of pollution and degradation—all of these are one, we must remind you. The distinctions you draw are to understand how these energies precipitate into your third density and especially your orange- and yellow-ray illusion. And this is well, for you must have some way of approaching this condition. But it is an illusion, a deception in fact, to think only in terms of who is giving and who is getting. It is one. You do not think of your pancreas as simply ruling over your body, do you? It is a conjunction of concerns that all serve your center, your heart, the gravitational point towards which your coherence obtains and is drawn towards.

So when you think of how to serve through the synchronous seeking with the planetary complex, you must first find a way to think about what is difficult without losing your desire to help in spite of the drop in the bucket, so to speak, your help constitutes. You must learn, my brothers and sisters, how to give in complete lack of certainty of outcome, to kick your expectations out of your heart. They are there to create an illusion in which you can focus on some things and take others for granted. One of the skills you must learn to become a citizen of the planet, a true co-Creator along with your complex, is to take into your heart all that lies before your gaze and not lose yourself. For this is crucial to being able to forgive each other enough to not lose what you have in common.

You may, indeed, think that some on this planet do not seek what you seek, that they are impediments to our forward evolution. We can think of many public figures who would fit this bill for any number of your fellow men and women. However, you are deceiving yourselves when you think this way, and this deception is useful for the purposes of discovering your polarized choice; quite useful. However, you here have chosen, and many on your planet have chosen, and so it is time to leave childish things behind; to let go of the animosity that you have been thoroughly processed by.

We say ”processed” because it has had an effect that is salutary. But processes end. You have been conditioned to be an agent of the complex as a coherent singular unit. Now, it is time to find the bonds with the other units, and this will require you to have a new attitude towards those things that pain you.

This will be difficult, for it was difficult for us. We of planet Oorkas did not have such a rough and discombobulating path towards social memory, but it was still difficult. And because our planet is not quite as lush and full of life forms and diversity as your planet, we had to find ways in which we communed more with the first density elements, for the second density life forms were less populated, and in our experience the… we pause to recenter.

(Brief interruption)

We continue. We are Oorkas.

We found that the paucity of resources on our planet demanded more cooperation, with the efficient use and sharing thereof. In this way, we have been on the same trajectory as our brother, Hatonn.2 While they experienced more bellicosity on their path, we experienced more need to stabilize how we related to the planet, and this was a gift in disguise, for we realized the planet has much to offer once the decision has been made that it is our shared heritage, and it actually answers many of the gnawing questions that the veiled third density experience brings about.

We wish in our service towards third density applicants to Confederation membership to teach this, for it appears to have been a unique experience. Not every people on a planet learn how truly unified they are with their environs on this level, and indeed, there is a connection with many of your indigenous peoples. For we did not have a 100% graduation towards service-to-others any more than we expect you to, and the members of our complex who needed more education, so to speak, have influenced some of your peoples. So we feel a great common bond with this planet, and we feel that you teach us much of what we never experienced. It is a darker lesson, but it teaches us about our Creator.

So when you decide that you belong to your Mother Earth and that you cannot, out of comfort and convenience, eschew those aspects that make one feel un-human, those civilizational dimensions of your selfhood that have, for many, many millennia, convinced you and your siblings that this planet is but the stage you play on—but it is part of the play!—then you must gird your loins and go into the fray with open hearts and demonstrate the depth of connection that truly exists.

How may you demonstrate this? For this is the means towards synchronization and the very nature of service in the manner of offering, as opposed to the manner of receiving. The master Jesus did say it was more blessed to give than receive,3 and in this sense we concur because the giving is what is needed right now. There will be much, much time afforded for the more passive lessons of receiving, of letting the new vibrations sink in and calm down the social conflagrations that burden you at this time.

Well, first, we offer that the daily meditation continues to give one the best guidance. It is better guidance than we give. It is better guidance than any of our Confederation siblings give, for it allows you to connect to your center, and you cannot connect to the planetary center absent that connection within your center.

Remember: this is an infinite creation. It is a unity, consequently, and it is true that when it fractures into separation, each piece has itself a center. And so, you occupy an illusion that is, in a sense, a vast graph of nodes all connected to each other. It is not as bleak as it seems for this reason. The connections are already there, my brothers and sisters. It is within yourself that you begin to realize this, and with that resonance you identify the centers without yourself; not simply other humans like you: the centers of second-density creatures and life-forms, centers of first-density entities beginning to awaken to the mind/body cycle. These are all at your fingertips so that you may connect, so that the energy that is flowing through you can have an outlet and thereby show you the graph, the great map of centers that belie the unity behind the deception, the infinity that is actually approachable when you are vibrating at this level.

You need not despair that your concept of this infinity will be abstract and imagined. No, remember: third-density veiled consciousness is unique. It is not the totality of your experience. And the more you connect within, the more you will remember in those deep, non-intellectual manners that the intuitive side of your mind will confer.

As you connect with these other centers, carefully and slowly—not demanding prefabricated outcomes; instead waiting, being patient, waiting for the most delicate and tender of greetings—you will find that our brother Max has spoken well when he suggested “synchronization” in the original question. For you will find that there is a rhythm, a cadence to these connections. They will not speed you up. No, they will slow you down, and you will feel that you will want to surrender, to become a vessel for this powerful but slower waveform. You will find that your ego, so to speak, your yellow-ray self, is but a tiny tip of a vast iceberg, and you will find that it will balk a bit at the surrender that is needed in order for this powerful but wider band waveform to harmonize with that which you consider yourself to be.

You must learn to take the meditative mindset into the illusion, my brothers and sisters. For you will find, we predict, that meditation is actually quite different in its character—in the character that is important and that makes it more fulfilling—than the outward behavior that you practice solo and as a group. What makes meditation fulfilling and rewarding will begin to be rewarding and fulfilling in the outer experience when you are able to let yourself follow the tuning of your environs. It will not come through action, but it will be expressed through one or two acts over an indeterminate period of time.

Those who have achieved this level of awareness that is in sync with planet Earth find true peace, and yet they are busy to the outward eye. How can this be? Well, they are finding that they are instruments: that while they maintain their unique, irreplaceable personalities, it is not so necessary any longer to foist that identity upon others. As they balance, clear their energy centers of their dissonant, unprocessed lessons, they find that they are Earth; that Earth is them, and therefore, they become more fully who they individually are by trying less hard.

We were there too. But (and we appreciate this instrument allowing this quip) in late third density, y'all are a bunch of try-hards. It's not necessary to struggle so much in order to serve. It is a struggle to learn to get there, and therefore we do not mean to denigrate you. Indeed, this instrument has experienced, even in the past hours, that haughty, egoic feeling of who's right and who's wrong; the one-upsmanship of the debate culture, the dreaded discourse that we entertain ourselves with and pretend we are accomplishing good work through.

This is perfectly fine, for you must be where you are. And so, what we offer as your brothers and sisters of Oorkas—as well as your brothers and sisters of a vast confederation spreading the cosmic awareness slowly and carefully across the universe—is simply inspiration. This is why you must use your discernment, for you cannot be inspired by something that is false. You will not be attracted to something that is not yours, and so we are content to wait patiently for you to make the discovery that yes, indeed, it is yours. We know this already, and we know that words placed in this instrument's mind are unconvincing, unpersuasive. But just as we caution you against the persuasive mindset towards each other, so do we obviate the place of persuasion in our intercourse with you.

Now, as your evolution continues apace alongside your planet, you shall discover, to your great surprise, that the windows in the veil between the conscious and unconscious minds will grow. And at first, this will feed your personality, and you will tamp down the horror of being so much more than you know you are by ascribing this evolution to your accomplishments as a conscious self, much as a child will take credit for all of the things that the parents do, not realizing the undergirding of the family, taking for granted hours, days, years of patient stewardship and parenting that go unnoticed and unappreciated.

This is not a creation in which credit is important; you must realize this. In fact, it gives you a nice tool for identifying when you are overcompensating with your personality and your yellow-ray approach. For when you feel the credit is not justly distributed, you know what mode you're operating in, and you can with time learn to take a step back from that. All of these flaws of personality become signposts that help you tune, instead of ways that you play out of tune with the orchestra. You simply change the tuning, and voila! There is no need for judgment, for punishment. When you get five from adding two plus two, great: now you have something to work on. And as you grow into your co-creatorship, you will start to see that these flaws and bumps into the wall are truly your best teachers.

Now this has a planetary connotation as well, for you bump into the wall as a people as well. The despair you feel at the careening, out-of-control vehicle that is your nation-state is a sign. It is a flashing warning sign, but not of the end. It is simply a sign that you must go deeper. You must slow down. You must work on the shadow side of yourself. And it will seem as if you are self-indulgent and ignoring the true peril. And you will be harshly scolded by those who have not aligned with the vibration that is incoming as you continue to cross into the fourth density sector of space. Forgive them, for they know not what they do,4 and you know there is only one place they will end up: back in your arms as you cradle each other in the Creator's arms. And this skill of learning to have this faith, of learning to invoke it, will slowly but steadily provide a comfort. Not a comfort for your personality though; you will learn to find comfort in a greater self.

This is the draw towards social memory, this change in the center you are orbiting. Instead of orbiting around your entertainment, your careers, even your families, you will learn that you serve all of those better when you recognize your true gravitational center. And this is not one discovery; it continues over and over and over again. And this will be the character of fourth density for you until you reach that point where you are a master of the energies and the emotions that make you such an important agent and constituent of the Creator.

As a final note, we wish to acknowledge the concepts this instrument has—with our help as well as the help of other complexes with which we associate—that there is something about how relating to the planet, relating to the collective unconscious that the planet represents, helps you relate to your own unconscious and vice versa. As you learn to work through the veil and participate in your greater selfhood, you learn what it means to be part of a social memory complex and to have the full resources of the planet at your disposal without being at your personal command. We would not delve too deeply into this, for we feel the monologue has gone on long enough. But we encourage you, if you find this concept intriguing, to ask about it now or at a future time, for we feel that there are several questions in the air orbiting around this center we share.

We would simply say that the key to appreciating a connection with the subconscious at the collective or individual level is an appreciation for expenditures of energy that have a certain purity to them. They will first register themselves within your life experiences. When you are able to confidently and consistently identify these expenditures, then my brothers and sisters! oh then you will see that what you have unveiled within yourself is not simply the code for your own true nature, but indeed the code for the planet's nature, for your unity with the planet.

And one more thing before we open to questions. When we say planet, it is clear this instrument has in mind a physical body: a sphere of rock and vegetation and water. And that is true; this is the planet. But please do not limit your connection to Mother Earth to just these elements. My brothers and sisters, you are embarking upon a wondrous and mysterious journey to the center of the Creator, and you are taking one more step on that path as you learn to unify and synchronize and serve the local part of the Creator that is Earth. This planet and its experiences throughout the three cycles of third density it has enjoyed will be a great gift to us in the Confederation and to the Logos whose character and will we continue to strive towards. Let it be a joyous and celebratory step forward. As you mourn that which is to be released, let your hearts rejoice at that which you are making room for.

I am Oorkas. I am grateful that you have had patience with this instrument and with our planet's message, for it has not arrived without distortion, we must confess. Look to the center of the message, not the words. Connect with the center of yourselves and then connect with the message, and you will be able to separate the wheat from the chaff and take the true hope that we convey as we convey it and as we mean it. And this is, again, a skill you are learning with great advantage to all who cross your paths.

Now, are there any questions we might entertain? We are those of Oorkas.

Max: Okay, I'll ask a question. Say ten citizens of the world come and stand in front of me. There is always going to be people that I want to be friends with and people that I feel I don't want to be friends with or maybe even repulsed or disgusted by. How can I make sure to treat everyone equally with respect even if I don't need to equally aid each one? Will this get easier with the veil thinning? That's my question.

Yes, my brother. We are Oorkas and are aware of the question in your heart. In truth, it is a question each here asks him or herself. For to be in service, in true service, is so daunting in your current condition of social menagerie.

Recall our point about connecting with your own center, with being able to work with the unconscious. There is an element that we neglected to mention, and we appreciate you bringing it up for it is one of those elements that is seemingly tougher for you than it was for us: your shadow side, your shadow self, those parts of yourself that repulse you, that embarrass you, that you would not dare to acknowledge to yourself, let alone another.

Accept those. As you pull back the veil, my brother, there will be much to accept, to work with and digest and chew on, many hard barriers around your heart to dissolve. When you do this, feel into the process, my brother. This feeling will help you recognize the vibration of doing this work with your other selves.

We mean this quite literally, you see. Learning how to recognize these basic energy signatures is what we were getting at earlier, for they call to the archetypal mind, you see, and the more that you can purely feel them, the more you can work with them as a kind of alphabet by which you write the new constitution for your planet. We speak in metaphor, of course. But it is only to wake yourself up to your own full character that others challenge and annoy you so.

This is what makes third density so valuable: that it makes the distortions that need balance addressable and identifiable. For in the time/space experience and in the more fluid experiences of space/time in other densities, it just isn't so workable. One flows in and out of rejection and acceptance with no pause, and the reflection that allows one to appreciate them is much lessened because one is fully expanding into the panoply of identities, the spectra of ways of selfhood.

Perhaps this explains why you placed so many seemingly insurmountable challenges before yourself pre-incarnatively, my brother. They did not seem like such solid things to begin with when you were in the time/space mindset, the time/space consciousness that is the other side of the coin of your full selfhood. And as such, consider that the gnarly connections that obtain with certain people make them that much more precious to you. You will agree with us when you are on our side of the line, we assure you.

Finally, we would refer you to the words of our brothers and sisters of planet Monka, because they made a very good point to this instrument at a time when he was wrestling with similar resentments and repulsions.5 Social memory is not about friendship. It's not about a personal relationship that validates who you think you are, who you want to be. It reveals all of you to you, and this is that which is acceptable as well as that which is less than acceptable. This is why it is an evolutionary process, and not simply one of stopping into the bar to say hi to Norm and the crew, if you get our joke. It's work, and the more that you commit yourself to a life that is about development, the more you will see that it is not only your development that you toil and strive for.

Have we satisfactorily addressed your concerns, my brother?

Max: Yes, thank you.

We are those of Oorkas, and we thank you, my brother. This was an important element, and part of the distortion in the original message was the omission of your contribution. So we are extremely grateful, as is this stumbling and imperfect instrument.

May we address ourselves to another concern in this circle?

David: Oorkas, I have a concern. Our Mother Earth is able to take negative energy and transform it into something else. And it seems like there's been a buildup of negative energy. Is there any concern or danger of Mother Earth taking on too much negative energy at this present time?

No, my brother. We are those of Oorkas. We do not feel that this is an overarching concern that would worry us were we in your position, which is how we think you mean to express your query, and if we are mistaken, please follow up. Let us provide a short explanation of our sanguine attitude.

There are ways the Earth expresses its dissonant energies it has absorbed. Earth changes are one. We do not make any prediction; we simply point you to the fact that there are pressure release valves, shall we say. Much as the subconscious will let out those things you mash down inside of yourself, so too will the Earth let out an inconvenient wave of tangled energy.

Now, this inconvenience is something that, if you are vibrating at the level of consensus reality, will seem like disaster, and we do not quibble with your concern for those you love and their physical presence in life. We understand. But as you do work on yourself to balance and accept those things that you have not fully worked out (for they do not have the sinister nature that often is assumed) you will learn how yourself to express in helpful and constructive ways the balancing of the planetary negative energies.

Indeed, what you are witnessing in the political, cultural, social dimensions of your social memory complex are—in ways that may not seem to you to be helpful—very, very helpful for exactly this reason. The more you deal with and face the darkness consciously and in the collective context, the more you deal with the political upheavals, the social nastiness, and the cultural hollowing out, and face the shallowness of the third density experience when it is solely material and egoic, the less the planet has to sublimate it, you see.

So thank your political rivals. Shake the hand of those who prowl and prey on the weak. Learn to love the decline of your civilization, for it is showing you what was always there. And in ways that the Earth previously had to balance in cataclysmic manners, you will be able to get ahead of it as a planet.

We do not promise that Earth changes are out of the question, but we do not predict them either. We are not party to, nor are we the spokesperson of, your planetary unconsciousness. And this is the limit of what we can say, for it is your project, your discovery, your work to do.

Does this answer the question in your heart, my brother?

David: It does. Thank you, Oorkas. I appreciate your reassurances.

We appreciate you. We are Oorkas, and we understand it is a scary time. That fear is a friend. You will learn, the hard way or the easy way, how to take this friend into your arms. And we are here with you, witnessing this great work. And when you put your head in your hands in despair, there is an aspect of us, and of your planet, which is singing in praise, for you are finally facing your true calling, and you have to hit bottom first to arise.

We are those of Oorkas. We are being informed by this instrument that it is high time that we part ways with you, and we hope that you have enjoyed this session a fraction as much as we have. Thank you for diligently coming together and opening up in love and honesty to each other. Take this energy to those not in this circle. Take that love; take that hope; show them that vision through your actions, through your forgiveness, through your willingness to sacrifice.

You are so close to us. We are almost touching your fingers over the fence. A little farther, my brothers and sisters. A little farther.

We are Oorkas, and we take our leave of this circle, in the love and in the light of the One Infinite Creator. Adonai vasu borragus. ☥

1. The Richmond Meditation Circle made a short, unrecorded contact with Oorkas the evening before this session. We brought some ideas for topics, and Oorkas offered some related or developed suggestions. This is what they mean when they later say “we do admit that we have exercised a say in your query.”

2. Hatonn via unknown: November 16, 1980

3. Acts 20:35

4. Luke 23:34

5. Monka via Weiland: January 15, 2023
item.excerpt:encoded:
After a long break, Richmond Meditation Circle makes contact with Oorkas to discuss humanity’s connection to the planet as fourth density approaches. This involves the shared experience of Earth as a unifying center for all beings and the challenging path towards unifying with her. Oorkas encourages individuals to embrace the planet’s struggles as part of their own journey, urging the development of one’s intuitive faculties to cultivate a deep connection with Earth and a recognition of the interconnectedness of all life. This entails a shift in perspective, moving away from seeing the planet merely the setting for human activity and instead recognizing it as an full partner in our joint evolution.
Oorkas advises that true service to other selves and the planet involves learning to give without attachment to outcomes, suggesting meditation as the key to aligning with one’s inner center and, by extension, the planetary center. They stress the direct and maturing experience of social memory and the importance of integrating the shadow self to foster unity and healing. The session concludes with Oorkas addressing concerns about the planet’s response to global negative energies as well as relating to other selves regardless of personal affection.

item.title: Monka on Tuning to the Planet
item.dc:creator: jeremy
item.content:encoded:
Introduction

In this session the fifth density social memory complex of Monka work with some of the finer points in the individual mind/body/spirt complex’s harmonization with the planetary complex. Monka builds upon Oorkas’s last message by providing some abstract guidance on tuning to Earth, working with the obstacles to this inherent in the yellow-ray self. Contrasting personal comfort with Mother Earth’s comfort, they discuss the nature of sacrifice, intellectualism, control, and the use of thought forms that can focus the planet’s desire in ways that harmonize the civilizational with the natural. Monka ends by answering questions revolving around using feelings of discomfort and feeling into patterns in nature that inform how we might work with our own unconscious.

Group question

What are some practical ways we can intuitively think about our common home in Earth and honor her needs even if doing so is uncomfortable?

Channeled message

(Jeremy channeling)

I am Monka. I am now with this instrument, greeting all in this circle in the radiant love and sacred light of our Infinite Creator. It is quite a treat and an honor to join with you intrepid spirits on this wonderful summer day on your planet. As we observe the conditions of vibration resonating through this circle, we pause to offer our deep and humble blessings such as they are. Your experience of late on this planet has felt very touch-and-go, to put it mildly. And this is in truth, my brothers and sisters, the character of seeking at this late hour in third density. 

The complex of Ra spoke of a concept they called the light touch,1 and it is somewhat curious that you should hone your skill in this area at a time when there is much convulsion, much trepidation and worry, within your social complex; learning to lightly dance upon the substrate of your culture; to dip in here, to dip out there, to learn exactly what loving means. Oh, my brothers and sisters! You are in the midst of a great lesson. And if we were capable of envy, we would be feeling it now. For you will grow and expand your awareness of whom you already are in such leaps and bounds as to cause wonder amongst the saints and angels. 

Our typical caveat we shall offer at this moment. We are two densities removed from your experience. This is our service: to provide a perspective that is wholly other than what you encounter in your lives on a daily basis. It is not more correct; it is not better aligned to your challenges. It is simply different. And verily we say, it is not always what a given mind/body/spirit complex occupying a position in your illusion may need to hear now, in the future, or ever. You must be the patrons of your learning. You must guide that personality you shepherd through this illusion on terms you judge to be advantageous and filtering through this experience the Creator's radiance of light and love and power. 

These are your matters to arbitrate, and we leave the matter entirely in your capable hands, my brothers and sisters. That means you must ignore and disregard any ideas or exhortations we offer which seem off or wrong to you. In this manner, you grant us a freedom; you unbind our hands from that position we normally occupy of observation and merely sending you our love and good wishes. You allow us a brief moment in which we may commune with you in your circle in third density, in this illusion. And this is such a gift for us, for we are not perfect. We are not your betters. We are your brothers and sisters. We reach our hand out to you because there is something that we can offer, we are gambling; but also, there is something you offer us. Let our benefit from your interactions with us not come at the cost of your stumbling on your path. 

This is not a big ask, so to speak; we simply remind you that you need not place what we say on a pedestal, nor need you place any social memory complex visiting your planet in this kind of puffed-up position of authority. Exercise your discretion, your discrimination, and your judgment, and you will do well with what we offer, even if it is to hold the hand up when the chalice is passed to you and to demur. This is acceptable. You do us a great service merely by offering our complex the vibration it enjoys at this moment. 

Now, one of the features of the vibration we enjoy in our presence with you this afternoon has to do with our extreme anticipation for the fruition of Earth in her journey side by side with you towards the great goal of self-awareness in the creation, the ability of the third density entity to finally recognize its role in the evolution of the cosmos. There is only one moment, and there is only one place in truth. However, we dream with you this dream of the Creator learning different avenues to its own knowledge of its nature, of the character of experience that is useful for an all-embracing Creator to recognize itself in the mirror, and this is well: you being in this drama at the moment, and we occupying a position of remove, so to speak, of observation. 

The question this day will be addressed according to this vantage point, for in truth, my brothers and sisters, you know more about the problem than we do; the specific issue of your social complex's sympathetic vibration with this centering feature in the cosmos which you call Earth. There are many names in the Confederation for this planet, and as you graduate into your new social body, you will learn of them, and you will announce yourselves as on the stage. "Shan" is how we refer to your planet,2 for it is an ancient concept in our society that such a people as you would gather the seemingly broken threads of the Creator and patch them together and redeem the logoic experiment at this sector such that we may, as the entire Confederation, move forward into our next chapter, you see. 

Many in your planet's orbit have wrestled with the issues that are being expressed in your politics and in your culture that have to do with a particular kind of dissonance. You see, this moment in your planet's evolution is centered on how to be individuals acting in concert. This concerted seeking is the end point of your third density foray into separation and mindful balancing of the entire series of complexes at work. We realize that much has been discovered in this dissonance, this animosity that plays out on all levels of your society. 

You are individuals, each with a spark glowing within, radiating light out in more pure and less pure ways such that you provide your brothers and sisters with a kind of verification of the true nature of this complex. It contains in it the signature of that which will certify and validate your recognition of the social memory complex just about to emerge. It is very close, you see. And as such, there is much remedial work being done at a swift pace. Our brothers and sisters of Oorkas explained that this work is occurring in the open, shall we say, as compared to past ages where unfinished business was sublimated into the collective unconscious of which your planet is the keeper.3

This is your test as a people: not a test designed to judge you; a test designed to determine what you want. Do you want to be one planet? When you elevate your whims and desires, your concepts of a personality with a place of honor in this society, or when you withdraw from that in an imbalanced manner, are you in fact meeting this need for harmonization? Or are you insisting that the you that is easy and familiar be protected at all costs? In this way, we adumbrate the portion of your query dealing with comfort. Whose comfort, my friends? Whose comfort? 

Now we recognize, as do many listening to this message, that there is only one subject of this thought and emotion. But how you mediate this subjectivity individually is the overarching melody that is playing against all other melodies that can be heard on this planet. We trust you take our meaning, my brothers and sisters, for as a performer of a personality in third density, you can play with the rest of the band, or you can use your solo to stifle others. When you choose to elevate your individual personality—and you may read this as ego, as yellow-ray self, many ways in which you can articulate the separate feeling of individuality—you have made a choice of what Earth shall be in that moment, in that feeling of selfhood. And there is truly nothing wrong with this, for you are not here to melt into a pool of society. Your distinctiveness as an actor in the yellow-ray matrix is proper, you see. The question is, what will you do with that agency? How will your actions in the social complex reflect the desires of your heart? 

Our brothers and sisters of Hatonn have spoken in the past of the manner in which you come together in this way or separate.4 They seem to feel you could do well simply by meditating and feeling into what is needed, and this is not wrong. But we have spoken in the past of the function of the illusion of your third density reality to ground that which you desire in a sacrifice of sorts, this sacrifice being the easy and well-known identity that you have learned to reproduce from moment to moment.5

The desire in your heart is already known, my brothers and sisters. You are not so different from any other thing in the universe. You seek oneness no matter what pole you are attracted to. Its attraction is a function of that desire for oneness. It is merely an issue of how you go about that, and without a firm concept of what would realize that oneness you learn by rote, by the buffeting of catalyst, how to channel that desire into something that the planet, that your experience, can reinforce and reflect. So, if you recognize that your individual personality is being made supreme over other concerns, it is simply a lesson in the pole we call service-to-self in which you draw unto yourself the centering feature that might otherwise be occupied in faith, in a trust in the planet's centering role. 

We hope that in explaining it this way, you may gain some confidence in experimenting as service-to-others polarizing entities in releasing the need for that center that reinforces the comfortable personality you have attained to date, because it is not easy to place the self on the sacrificial block. It is no trivial matter to take a step back and to tune in to the greater need, especially when you have every indication that this greater need expressed by your planet—and truly through the nascent social memory complex you all feel—is treated so shabbily by others around you. 

Now, we do not wish to speak in judgment of anyone on your planet. As the principle known as Q’uo has mentioned in the past, you are being trained by this, and it is part of the puzzle to reckon with this so that you can become whole selves and offer whole selves to a whole planet.6 And this wholeness, my brothers and sisters, is not yet at the point of being free of sorrow, free of pain. To take in the entire picture that is before you will not be an act free of fear, of doubt, of hardship, and it is only the most mature souls who can throw it all on the line, so to speak, and give themselves to the planet and the Creator by extension. 

This is where it is useful to think of the sub-densities, so to speak, of the third density experience. We look at your circle and find that your concerted efforts have borne fruit because each of you has offered something, has learned to attenuate your personal validations, such that the circle forms a complex of its own: one of trust and common seeking. If you feel what this has entailed for you, it has one quality to it that we would illustrate through our words, and this has to do with the limited nature of your working. For you do not work like this on an utterly regular basis, do you? You tiptoe in on a weekly basis. Why can you not tiptoe in with the greater complex, or with any number of intermediate complexes of which you may open up in awareness? 

The planet will not be unified all in one fell swoop. For that to obtain as a possibility would mean something much more drastic and harsh than your social complex can bear at this moment. Indeed, our experience of other third density planets has given us quite a lot to chew on, so to speak, in this regard. We feel, truly, that just as Ra pushed the Egyptians a bit too hard—let their expectations be driven by an exaltation in the majesty of the Unified Creator, and thereby lost the plot a bit—we played a similar role in the evolution of that sphere which you know as Mars, and which we have another name for, which we do not share at this time.7

These names, remember, have the penumbra of a desire to control in them, for only that which is addressable is manipulable.8 How may you learn to use the names of your peoples, not as ways to train your frustrations and expectations upon them, but as ways to offer the self more nakedly, more plainly, more as a servant? For when you have mastered that task, you may then approach the center of the planet and offer all of yourself to her, not as a sacrifice in truth but as an ascension to your new personality, a personality that can align with other personalities without losing anything essential; a personality agile enough, flexible enough, humble enough to do what is needed to be done, in the way perhaps that your organs and cells work with the conditions of your body to effect an overall idea, an overall complex in which they have their being, and they feel the meaningfulness of that beingness. 

There is a word we may enunciate that captures this skill: tuning. Tuning, to give you a definition, is a way in which you withdraw from the need for control and yield, bend as the reed in the wind. This is not something you “do to,” but are helping yourself and others to recognize how to “be done to,” how to be a steward of that more feminine approach to the agency of mind and thought. You learn to be shaped by a form of thought that is beyond what you can sum up and capture and, most importantly, place a label on it. This ability to label things makes it safe for the intellect. The intuition needs no label; it needs hardly an address. It simply flows where it is needed as water. 

There is no object, no planning, no grand strategy. These are aspects of the intellect, and they have their place in seeking, my brothers and sisters, no doubt. But do you not, at this late moment in third density, see the limitations of strategy, of thinking and then gambling on whether your thought form you whipped up is in the same key as the issue it seeks to address? Or do you simply cling to it, regardless of its helpfulness to the situation because at least there you have a foothold, and you will not lose your precious little ego. We say this not in judgment; we say this to help you turn the cube 180 degrees so you may see another side, another capacity of the yellow-ray complex to yield, to serve, to be in tune with, just as your cells in your body yield and come into alignment with your unconscious structure, your autonomic experience of entity-ness. This is a great individual learning that bridges between you as a separate self and you as a cell in the Earth's body. 

Now, the analogy can go too far, can it not? For you are not simply a second density organism reacting and responding to the waveform in which you are drenched. You have your own ideas, born of the newly established connection with the actuated spirit complex, and therefore you can step outside of the situation, see the patterns, and direct the self as you see fit. All we are asking you to consider contemplating are the ways in which this withdrawal to a position of observation can also be a withdrawal that you practice in meditation: to learn to slow down, to refrain from simply reacting, to give this limited personality more options in response to a change in the key of the song Earth sings.

Now, you asked for practical ways to bring this intuitive capacity to bear, but there is nothing practical about it, my brothers and sisters; we are sad to inform you. We understand the ask you present us: to be able to do something, to be able to know that when you reach out in love, that you will be responded to with love. Now, this will be the future case, and it will be welcome when it obtains in your experience as a planet. But my friends, you have homework to do, and it is to learn how to release this need for your expectations to be fulfilled. That is the first step, and it is practiced in the quotidian schedule of life. 

Every day offers you a new opportunity to accept, to bend, and to let the wind blow through you. It is not simply chaos, but it might feel that way at first. We have offered ideas of subsidiarity in this complex formation. Your circle is one instance that represents the greater desire for unity on the planet, and it is valuable for the intimacy and intensity it represents, and there is comfort in that to be sure: comfort that was hard won by releasing the need for everything to make sense, for everything to happen as you see fit, and you have done good work here. Now, imagine what is the next level at which you can orbit a center, that you can harmonize to a key? It will not be the entire planet's key, but it can be at an interval that is harmonious. We trust in your imagination and meditative work to employ the intuition in this solution, for it is your work to do. 

As you walk about your planet, notice the different qualities of feeling that obtain in one location versus another. Instead of simply going as fast as you can to the store, or to work, or to your friend's house, or wherever, use the opportunity of changing location as an opportunity to become aware of the different energetic and vibratory qualities around you. This is a skill that will come easier to some of you than others. We therefore suggest perhaps taking mindful walks in areas of your planet that do not reflect the thought forms of your peoples so much but instead reflect the patterning of your Mother Earth, areas of nature in which growth and vibrancy call to different aspects of seeking.

This is a good place to start tuning to the planet because you can feel into what is urgent in her growth and what is subordinated. After this is accomplished, notice how this reflects meditative work and experiences, the unconscious mind reflecting that patterning of growth and vibrancy deep within you. For then when you cross into your more urban environments and feel the more regularized, the more harshly crystalline forms that impress themselves upon your consciousness, you have something to offer that setting that can heal what is imbalanced in it—not through some spell you cast or exercise you consciously work out, but as a matter of feeling, as a matter of recognizing your conscious awareness in a different kind of tuning; that it is still you but that it feels different. This is an explication of our brothers and sisters of Oorkas’s concept of the inherent energy expenditures deep within your consciousness,3 for you can slow down and wait to offer this fast-paced and energetically intense place upon your Mother Earth the complementary waveform, the balance to its own kind of vibrancy. What nature meets over the long run, you can meet in the moment in a much more immediate way. 

Do you see, my brothers and sisters? This is a thing only entities like you can do, but only in concert with your full selves, only as willing supplicants to the greater self of planet Earth. This is another clue in the puzzle we have heard your circle discussing: of how the conscious/unconscious dichotomy reflects the civilization/nature dichotomy. It may be worked with creatively. You therefore may with some benefit study the concept of the thought form, for this is the manner in which mind brings the body into alignment and brings spirit's overarching principles into instantiation. For you are an instance of spirit already, and it is merely a matter of fruitful reflection to ground this word, this logos, here where your feet are planted. 

You learn this on the couch as you meditate, in the circle as you share the common frustrations that give you the impulse to seek in common, and in the greater society with which your planet is begging and pleading to awaken. It is not a song that is solely in a major key. No, to do this you will have to face much of the pain that has accrued due to your people's thoughts and the way those thoughts have precipitated into harm. But therein lies your salvation as a planet, for if it is thought that must change, you do not need to donate to a political candidate, or buy a particular brand, or follow a specific self-help regimen. You can simply channel that desire into a different thought structure and thereby work at the level where the tuning is needed. 

We thank you for tuning into our message. You don't need to do this, and that you voluntarily release your desire for control to the gentle advice of your brothers and sisters of Monka does us such an honor and truly speaks to what you offer your Mother Earth at this moment. And we are grateful for your attention to this matter and the seeking that has guided this attention. Our message is a message your planet wants you to hear, and that we have been able to play a small role in helping in its conveyance to your conscious awareness helps us heal our past mistakes with other civilizations and peoples in your sector of the infinite creation, and we are in your debt, my brothers and sisters. 

We are those of Monka. May we address our complex to any queries you may have this afternoon?

Max: So, a lot of the time I can't tell if I'm intuitively feeling to refrain or go through with something or if that's a part of me that desires comfort that's reaching out. Can you shed some light or provide any insights on that? 

I am Monka. I am understanding your question in a certain manner and request your correction if we do not meet the mark, so to speak. Thank you for your patience. 

Your comfort is the outer shell of a deeper feeling nature. When we ask you to consider the sacrifice of your immediate comfort, we do not ask this because it is wrong to be comfortable. Indeed, there is very little that your intuition can offer you that would be useful if it were hateful to you. The intuition is the true root of what you pursue as comfort qua comfort. So, it is not that you should throw yourself into the fire of pain and hardship for the sake of pain and hardship. 

It is simply that when you are uncomfortable, you are learning. You are encountering something that doesn't feel right to the self you have learned to be, and you have an opportunity to dream up, shall we say, what a new kind of self might be—a third density conscious self, we mean, not your total self, for that is a given. Indeed, the tuning we are speaking of is part and parcel with a tuning within, and you may henceforth expect anything we address in your societal complex applies in some analogous way within and vice versa. For this is the mystery of reflection: that it all is drawn into the center, and it is the drawing that feels better or worse, my brother. 

Therefore, consider a way in which discomfort can be a signal to slow down and feel. This would be the way of working with this experience this instrument can convey to you at this moment. We would offer more, but we do not feel he can mediate the message quite appropriately at this moment. 

Does that approach anywhere near an answer to your question, my brother? 

Max: That works for me. Yeah, thank you. 

We are those of Monka. We are pleased that we could work with this instrument to do so, for we remind him that it is his tuning that is useful in our intercourse with you, and there are many different levels of our message that he may choose to convey to your circle, and all of them are acceptable to us so long as he keeps his third eye squarely on the beam incoming. 

Is there another query from your group? 

Max: Is the moon an extension of the Earth, and how does it serve the sublogos? 

We are those of Monka and appreciate the intuitive faculties you have brought to bear on this question. 

Indeed, the moon is the more feminine side of the experience of being on the surface of the planet. This can be confusing because you have heard us and others in the Confederation speak of your Earth as a mother, but when you approach the orbital nature of consciousness as we have hinted at in past sessions,9 you will see that this is a kind of phenomenon akin to reflection. 

When you are occupying the center of your awareness, it is a hologram of all of the energies and qualities inherent in that complex. As you occupy more distant positions from that center, you are traversing into the differentiated aspects of that center. In other words, in the same way that, say, your orbital model of the atom conveys different qualities in the electron than the proton or neutron, you have a way of understanding an atom more dialectically than you do when you consider the atom as a whole. Similarly the galaxy, the super galaxy, the solar system, the planetary system of Earth all offer different instantiations of the same notes in the scale at different scales of volume, so to speak. 

We do not know if this meets the need your question expressed, but we hope that you can sit with this message and once again, by feeling into its center and then expanding out and withdrawing within the different layers, you can see the principles involved such that each instance announces its truth to you. Surely you must understand that your experience of the moon is of far more value than ours. We offer a concept of the map, or rather a map, to you as a mind/body/spirit complex. But you must choose the route to take and the reason to travel, and there is no answer we may give to your query that does not require both the map and the purpose for using the map. 

Hopefully this analogy, this metaphor, will serve your further seeking where the strict interpretation of our words have failed. May we expand upon this in any way, my brother? 

Max: Would you mind going a little bit into how the moon affects the Earth energetically? 

I am Monka, and we will give a bit of an example of how one might approach this subject as long as we have your assurance you will not restrict your seeking to the model we lay out.

Think of the tides of your oceans and water bodies. Do you have any inkling of what that macrocosm might represent within you in microcosm? Think of the phases the moon offers your eyes standing on the surface of this planet. What do these phases perhaps call to within you from the point of view of your center? Do you see how there is not the pat, easy narrative that provides an answer to these things; that instead these questions only unravel more curiosity, more mystery, but that this does not leave you forlorn? That you simply learn to think on different levels and thereby to feel the answers that do not precipitate into language, but instead precipitate into new forms of thought that then are expressed through action, through intention in many different ways that you do not get to circumscribe with your conscious mind, but merely cooperate with?

May we trust that this puzzling response can satisfy you for the nonce, my brother? We are those of Monka. 

Max: It was perfect. Thank you, Monka. 

We are those of Monka. Are there any final queries at this moment? 

(No response)

Very well, my brothers and sisters. We have enjoyed our time with you. We feel a deepening in our relationship with you that makes up a bit for our last time we were with this circle.5 There will be times in the future where contact will be less than optimal, shall we say. This is part of reaching across the density barrier for wisdom and inspiration. Remember, only your careful and honest discernment of our words brings any value to our mission in common. 

You are sorely needed on this planet not as prophets of our message but as channelers of your own deepest truth. We simply wish to convey that this skill of serving and tuning to the planet is not something you will learn as an outer act, but in many cases will feel like remembering a deep, hidden resource. It is in this manner of conveying vectors of approach, modes of thought, feeling tones that ride alongside the thought forms you encounter that we urge you and cheer you on as you learn to come together and serve that great idea that draws you forth towards the upward spiraling light in the center of all creation: our One Infinite Creator. 

And now we take our leave of your circle. We are those of  Monka. You have been our good friends thus far, and we wish to say how grateful we are for all you have sacrificed to allow this message to come through. We leave you in the love and the light of our One Infinite Creator. Adonai vasu borragus. I am Monka. ☥

1. Ra via Rueckert: Session 34, Question 6

2. "Shan" is the name used for our planet as claimed by early contactees such as George Van Tassel. See The Council of Seven Lights (1958, De Vorss). Also mentioned in the channeled work of Richard Miller in the 1950s; see Star Wards (1979, Solar Cross Foundation).

3. Oorkas via Weiland: May 24, 2025

4. Some of these references Monka makes are hard to find, but they could be referring to Hatonn via Weiland: July 13, 2022

5. See the questions near the end of Monka via Weiland: August 31, 2024

6. Another uncertain reference, but it may be to Q'uo via Weiland: November 4, 2024

7. On Ra's experience with the Egyptians, see Ra via Rueckert: Session 1, Question 5 as a start. For Monka's experience with Mars, see Monka via Rueckert: February 2, 1986.

In the Solar Cross Foundation material, Confederation contacts referred to Mars as "Massar," and there may be other names out there in the lineage. See Star Wards (1979, Solar Cross Foundation)

8. Ra via Rueckert: Session 85, Question 7

9. Monka via Weiland: February 24, 2024
item.excerpt:encoded: In this session the fifth density social memory complex of Monka work with some of the finer points in the individual mind/body/spirt complex’s harmonization with the planetary complex. Monka builds upon Oorkas’s last message by providing some abstract guidance on tuning to Earth, working with the obstacles to this inherent in the yellow-ray self. Contrasting personal comfort with Mother Earth’s comfort, they discuss the nature of sacrifice, intellectualism, control, and the use of thought forms that can focus the planet’s desire in ways that harmonize the civilizational with the natural. Monka ends by answering questions revolving around using feelings of discomfort and feeling into patterns in nature that inform how we might work with our own unconscious.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Monka on Tuning to the Planet

item.title: Hatonn on Blending Energies
item.dc:creator: jeremy
item.content:encoded:
Introduction

In this short session inaugurating the Richmond Meditation Circle's 2025 Invitational, Hatonn pays a long overdue visit to discuss how the mysteries of oneness might be recognized in the illusion. Starting from the energetic nature of contact between the circle and their complex, they place before the seeker the choice of how they might perceive and make sense of outer events. This heuristic is extended to material objects and the operation of cause and effect, showing how the blending of energies enabling communication between the circle and Hatonn can be found analogously in all aspects of the illusion. The ubiquitous presence of this blending provides a hint about the unity behind the appearance of separation.

Group question

We are going to take a potluck in the tradition of Carla. So we are interested in any remarks the Confederation might wish to make this evening to kick off our 2025 Richmond Meditation Circle Invitational.

Channeled message

(Jeremy channeling)

I am Hatonn. I am with this instrument and bid you all good evening. It is our custom to come when we are called, and we feel the call this evening. My brothers and sisters, conditions are ripe, for you have prepared yourselves for not just one contact with members of our circle, our Confederation, but several opportunities lie before us. And in the spirit of bringing it back to basics, shall we say, we wish to visit again in all good humor and with a tender welcome to those who have not participated before. This instrument has long wondered why we have not visited, but we know he is certain in his trust of his faculties of tuning. And we are grateful to have the window which has been opened for us so that we may commune with your circle. And once again, synchronously share the love, light, power, and grace of he, of she, of the one who is our Creator, your Creator, the Creator of all. 

We will not detain your circle long, my brothers and sisters, for it is somewhat later than normal. And we have but a limited message to offer, unprompted by the discrete question normally offered a contact such as us. But first, let us set the house in order by offering our standard concern plainly to your circle, so that you may place our words in the proper context with no confusion. 

It is typical that contacts from our planet are treated with a certain regard by those who have an interest in the greater philosophy that we have had a small part in conferring to your peoples. We have no qualms about being held in a certain regard, for we reciprocate this respect. It is, however, crucial that you balance what we say with your own discernment, that you not ascribe authority to us. This is a topic this instrument has recently belabored with one of our students, and it bears reiterating. Should we speak and your ears close to the message, you must honor your ears, my brothers and sisters. You must honor your hearts and your searching minds, for they are closer to the divinity within you than our complex can claim. 

So please disregard any of our words that catch you in a pickle, or simply do not seem quite right. For, as this instrument has shared, we are a little bit off the beaten track this evening. You do best by letting the message be what it is, offering your love, your light, your power to the circle's thought form in and of itself. And, being content to take the measure of the message at some future point, this is the advantage of the recording devices you use, that you can focus on the moment and let the words be what they will, without having to commit your heart to their truth or falsity. Thank you, thank you, thank you for being very diligent in sifting through the chaff that words must inevitably constitute so that the wheat may be savored, and savored not simply as our message, but verily, my friends, as your own. For you blend your energies with ours, and this is well, this is the pattern of contact that we have participated in with those of your kind for many, many years. 

Now, you have heard us say that we blend energies with you, and you with us, and that this mixture is at the root of the very message you hear. What might this mean to you? We encourage you to think on this. Contact with non-corporeal intelligence is not very different, you see, from contact with those you sit next to or those who hustle and bustle about your place of working. 

This blending is part of the root of phenomena as you perceive them in this band of vibration. Because it is a blending, it begins to become uncertain in the extreme, my brothers and sisters, who is responsible for the message. For we draw upon your love and your calling as much as our own. We, too, call: we call for opportunities to serve; we call for guidance from those aspects of the Creator who blend with us. And in this blending, we do not pick and choose whose cause yields whose effect, you see. It is as one piece when the blending has occurred. It is a kind of pool of potential created from the convergence of hearts and minds. In other words, my brothers and sisters, it is a small foray into the reunification that draws all towards the conclusion of the octave. By this, we mean to indicate that operating at this more refined level, where discrete bodies lose their boundaries in each other, where you start to look for the motion of manifestation rather than that aspect of manifestation which grounds itself and stays static for your easy ascertainment. This leads to a kind of fuzzing of boundaries, and in this condition, how would one even speak of cause and effect? For it is all of one piece.

Now, this blending of energies is truly occurring constantly with or without your direct participation. It is simply a matter of keying into it, of looking—instead of where the objects are distinct—of looking in the spaces between the objects and seeing how they mutually reinforce one another. When change occurs, when a shift is noted, this is seen as some sort of result: a result that has a situating cause. This is a valid way of interpreting the patterns of the illusion such that meaning, narrative, order can be manufactured out of the plenum. But it is not, my friends, the only way to go about perceiving. Another way you may take stock of what the illusion has ready to disclose to you is to dilate the focus, and to see the blending instead of those items that stand apart from the swirl of energies. 

These conditions are a choice of perception, you see, not something innate in the phenomenon itself. So you see, cause and effect can be perceived, can be interpreted, instead of one object exerting force on another, as one consolidated object too big to perceive as a unity, too dispersed to see its motion as a contiguous phenomenon. 

These are all fancy ways of saying cause and effect is in the eye of the beholder. This has implications for your physics, for if objects are merely, at the end of the day, fields, then it is but an ontological gamble when one tells the story of “what happened.“ But you always have the option of seeing the unity between things and to see what seems to be the cause and what seems to be the effect as simply two sides of a shape moving synchronously through space. The change is some sort of indication of the temporal element involved. And this time passing is largely orchestrated as a function of consciousness.

You, in this circle, have contrived your consciousness to a point of focus: to find your center, and through that center, to place your finger on the center of the working, the point around which your fellow seekers orbit. Now, we wish to show that this account of the physical appearance of things has an analog, a more purified source in the consciousness you bring to bear. Just as it is impossible to tell whether you thinking of your friend caused them to respond, or their response was picked up beforehand by you, or both sides of the perception are connected inherently and occur with simultaneity, so too must you wonder: whose authorship is responsible for this message? Does it come from you? Does it come from brothers and sisters far away? Or is it possible, my friends, that if we are one in truth, that this is a distinction without a difference? 

We ask you to contemplate this earnestly—not because there is a correct answer here, but because this is an example of the turning of the cube metaphor we have employed in the past. For these are all ontological gambles; these are all models that are used to situate the illusion creatively. This is what it means, my brothers and sisters, to be self-aware: that you have a choice of how to perceive the panoply of distortions around you. You have a choice of how you regard mystery as it precipitates into your life. There is even the option of not making a clean and clear judgment call at all, but to simply let what filters into your awareness be as it is. 

We would ask that you contemplate these matters as you proceed into your weekend working. For we want you to appreciate this contact as not one fixed thing. You go about your rituals and your invocations and tunings and intention setting for a purpose. What contact has the potential to do, my friends, is to mirror back a deeper element of this purpose so that you may see something new in your own mind/body/spirit complex as well as the complex you create together. For at the end of the day, if we are truly all one, then our use of the illusion in appreciation of catalyst, in celebration of love shared, is but a small recapitulation of the grand project of our Creator. And you may endeavor to understand and accept more and more fully this oneness by reaching into your patrimony as the Creator. 

This is our message this evening. We are those of Hatonn. We thank your circle for letting this message, so difficult for this instrument to bridge, come through so that he may have an experience that is new, and you may share in this newness and cast your eyes upon the world freshly as small probes of the Creator into its own nature. 

May we address a question or two from your circle today? 

Dave: Hatonn, I don't have a question, but I would like to share my gratitude and your connection and your message that you shared with us today. 

Hatonn: We thank you, my brother. We are not unaware of the calling from your heart. We only hope that we find that overlap in our callings such that we may praise our Creator together that much more earnestly, that much more purely, that much more effortlessly and joyously. 

Seeing as there are no queries we may address, we will leave the matter there, allowing this instrument and your circle to conserve energy for tomorrow's workings. And leaving you, our brothers and sisters, so dear to us, in the love and light of our radiant One Infinite Creator, we will now take our leave of this circle. 

We are those of Hatonn. Adonai vasu, my brothers and sisters. Adonai vasu boragus. ☥

Starting from the energetic nature of contact between the circle and their complex, they place before the seeker the choice of how they might perceive and make sense of outer events.
